name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] [Happiness]>

unitUniques: Eliminates combat penalty for attacking across a coast <hidden from users>
Can only heal by pillaging <in [Lava] tiles>

civilopediaText.text: Global uniques are ruleset-wide modifiers that apply to all civilizations.
